workflows.creator: f21f100c-9e62-42e2-a744-061c18de134c
workflows.title: On Ready for Invoice Request changed

call-workflow-6.title: Update NS Subscription
call-workflow-6.description: Update the NS subscription according to the SF Primary Quote in the opportunity

message.value: Event is from another org ('{$.steps.trigger.organization_id}' instead of '{$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].Id}'). Please fix the sandbox outbound messages list.

boolean-condition-7.title: Quote is hard linked?
boolean-condition-7.description: If the quote is hardlinked, it means it was created in the old process and we don't need to regenerate the subscription because the subscription is already correct

boolean-condition-6.title: Subscription updated?
boolean-condition-6.description: If the subscription is not updated, we can't create the invoice ticket because the subscription could be with wrong items, values, etc.

value.description: The script result returned from the function
value.title: Result

netsuite-1.title: Get Subscription
netsuite-1.description: To get data to create Invoice ticket and contractual documents

salesforce-3.title: Set Manual O2C to true
salesforce-3.description: Set the opportunity to be processed manually in order to ISRs/SDRs create the invoice ticket.

call-workflow-7.title: Add message to description
call-workflow-7.description: To notify ISRs about what happened

message.value: Opportunity couldn't be updated: {$.steps.call-workflow-6.response.message}. Please, process invoice ticket manually.

netsuite-5.title: Query hard linked quote
netsuite-5.description: Run the SQL to check if the quote is hard linked

boolean-condition-4.title: Manual o2c?
boolean-condition-4.description: When its manual o2c we dont need to change netsuite because o2c will do it manually

break-loop-1.title: Continue Loop
break-loop-1.description: Go to next opportunity since the subscription can't be updated

dependencies.name: Convert a SF Quote to a NS Subscription
